channel.title: Send messages ingame from server cmd prompt?
channel.description: is there a way to make it to where you can send ingame announcements from just your server command prompt? 317 pi

item.title: Send messages ingame from server cmd prompt?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

You do not need a GUI… You could telnet to the server to connect from anywhere, or just have it continually check for input on the host machine

Read full topic
